title: Artificial Intelligence and porcupines: Breaking down the motifs at the Humans in the Loop screening at SCREEN Film Club
description: Aranya Sahay's critically acclaimed, award-winning film Humans in the Loop was screened as part of the SCREEN Film Club at the National Centre of Performing Arts in Mumbai on Monday.
content: “When our children are growing up, we teach them how to differentiate between colours and objects. Then we force our morality on the children,” said Sahay, adding, “If this job is akin to parenting, can AI be looked at as a child? There are two schoo... [2153 chars]

title: Musk names former Morgan Stanley banker Anthony Armstrong as new xAI finance chief: Report
description: According to the Financial Times, Elon Musk has named former Morgan Stanley banker Anthony Armstrong as the new CFO of artificial intelligence company xAI. He will lead the finance operations for both xAI and social media platform X, replacing Mike Liberatore as CFO.
content:

title: OpenAI’s Golden Touch Spreads as Stocks Soar Off Mere Mentions
description: OpenAI has already proved it has a golden touch when it comes to partnering with other tech firms to deploy its artificial intelligence products. Its power to move shares, though, is rapidly spreading to companies it even briefly discusses teaming up with.
content: (Bloomberg) -- OpenAI has already proved it has a golden touch when it comes to partnering with other tech firms to deploy its artificial intelligence products. Its power to move shares, though, is rapidly spreading to companies it even briefly discu... [3083 chars]

title: Apple's Siri Under Criminal Investigation In France After Human Rights Group Alleges Privacy Violations
description: French prosecutors have launched a criminal investigation into Apple's Siri over alleged illegal data collection, intensifying scrutiny of the company's privacy practices as it faces growing criticism for falling behind rivals in artificial intelligence.
content:
On Monday, French prosecutors opened a criminal investigation into Apple Inc.'s (NASDAQ:AAPL) Siri after receiving a complaint.
French Cybercrime Unit Probes Siri Over Data Collection Claims

title: Open AI's Fidji Simo Says AI Investment Frenzy 'New Normal,' Not Bubble
description: The dizzying investments in artificial intelligence infrastructure do not constitute a bubble but rather represent today's "new normal" to meet skyrocketing user demand, Fidji Simo, OpenAI's de facto number two, said on Monday.
